content.rendered:
Welcome to Saratoga Springs High School!  Our school counseling team supports every student in order to facilitate the growth and development of academic, personal, social, and career readiness skills throughout high school and beyond!

View the 2024 8th to 9th grade Academic Information Night Presentation

View a PDF of the 2024 Scheduling Presentation

View the SSHS Academic Program Guide and course advisement information
